original_text: All the time, they are looking for women who will have sex with them. They never stop doing wicked things. They teach people who have weak minds to believe wrong things. They just want more and more things to make themselves happy. God will certainly punish these people, because they are so bad.
korean_text: 음심이 가득한 눈을 가지고 범죄하기를 그치지 아니하고 굳세지 못한 영혼들을 유혹하며 탐욕에 연단된 마음을 가진 자들이니 저주의 자식이라

sentences.original_text: All the time, they are looking for women
who will have sex with them
They never stop doing wicked things
They teach people who have weak minds
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 약한 마음을 가진 사람들을 가르칩니다

sentences.original_text: They just want more and more things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그저 점점 더 많은 것을 원합니다

sentences.original_text: God will certainly punish these people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 분명히 이 사람들을 벌하실 것입니다
